snippet: The Myanmar Army has been fighting rebels of the Kokang, a Chinese ethnic group that has lived in the mountains of northern Myanmar for more than 400 years.
abstract: Myanmar Army has been fighting rebels of Kokang, Chinese ethnic group that has lived in mountains of northern Myanmar for more than 400 years; battle, which has been going on for past six weeks, has created tens of thousands of refugees and ill will with China.

byline.contributor: Wai Moe contributed reporting from Yangon, Myanmar. Yufan Huang contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: The Myanmar Army has been fighting rebels of the Kokang, a Chinese ethnic group that has lived in the mountains of northern Myanmar for more than 400 years.

headline.main: Myanmar’s Fight With Rebels Creates Refugees and Ill Will With China
headline.print_headline: Myanmar’s Fight With Rebels Creates Refugees and Ill Will With China

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
